minesweeper.domain

Class Minefield

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.domain.Minefield

  • public class Minefield
extends Object
    Contains the Information about the minefield and contains all the cells of the game. Creates the cells and marks basic info(mines and the count of adjacent mines), but doesn't do operate the cells otherwise
    Author:
    juri

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates the minefield.

      • IncreaseMineCountForAdjacentCells

        public void IncreaseMineCountForAdjacentCells(int x,
                                     int y)
        Increases the mine count for adjacent Cells. Takes a mine at point (x.y) and Increases the mine count of each adjacent Cell.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate

      • locationIsInsideMatrixBorders

        public boolean locationIsInsideMatrixBorders(int j,
                                    int i)
        Makes sure that the given location does not go outside of the 2D array.
        Parameters:
        j - x coordinate
        i - y coordinate
        Returns:
        Is the given location outside of borders.
